table.sql: id, commodity_id, mobile, amount, gmt_create, gmt_modified, create_by, modify_by

operation.name: insert
operation.sql:
INSERT INTO inventory ( commodity_id, mobile, amount, gmt_create, gmt_modified,
create_by, modify_by ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, ?, ? )

operation.name: addAmountByMobile
operation.sql: UPDATE inventory SET amount = ? ,gmt_modified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,modify_by = ? WHERE mobile = ? and commodity_id = ?

operation.name: queryByMobileAndCommodityId
operation.sql:
SELECT
FROM inventory WHERE mobile = ? and commodity_id = ? limit 1

operation.name: findPage
operation.sql:
SELECT inv.id, inv.commodity_id, inv.mobile, inv.amount, inv.gmt_create,
inv.gmt_modified, inv.create_by, inv.modify_by, u.name,
com.commodity_name FROM inventory inv left join agent u on inv.mobile = u.mobile left join (select name as commodity_name, id from commodity ) com on inv.commodity_id = com.id WHERE 1=1
inv.mobile = #mobile#
u.name = #nickName#
inv.commodity_id = #commodityId#
inv.gmt_modified >= #fromDate#
inv.gmt_modified <= #toDate#

operation.name: getInfoByMobile
operation.sql:
SELECT inv.id, inv.commodity_id, inv.mobile, inv.amount, com.code,
com.name, com.price, com.unit, com.weight, com.description,
com.manufacturer_id FROM inventory inv left join agent u on inv.mobile = u.mobile left join commodity com on inv.commodity_id = com.id
inv.mobile = #mobile#
inv.id = #id#
com.name like concat('%',#name#,'%')
